alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:47PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Aitkin, northwestern Pine and western Carlton Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 746 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Big Sandy Lake, to 7 miles southwest of Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, to near Garrison, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... McGregor around 750 PM CDT. Tamarack around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cromwell and Kettle River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin
